extension.name: Community - Jomsocial Notification
extension.author: JomSocial Team
extension.description: This module is meant to display the three JomSocial notifications; global notification, friend requests and private messages. Please make sure this module is made visible for Registered users only.

param.name: customCache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module.

param.name: show_global_notification
param.label: Show Global Notification
param.description: Select whether to show the global notification.

param.name: show_friend_request
param.label: Show Friend Request
param.description: Select whether to show the friend request.

param.name: enable_private_message
param.label: Show Private Message
param.description: Select to enable the private message.
